I think there's some confusion again. Black Friday was on November 25th, not 27th. It's possible that the sale you mentioned was a pre-Black Friday sale or a extended sale that started on the 27th, but Black Friday itself was on the 25th.

That being said, congratulations on scoring a great deal on the 4K TV! 40% off is an excellent discount. I'm sure you're enjoying your new TV.

Now, let's focus on finding a great deal on an HP laptop. With the upcoming sales events I mentioned earlier, you might be able to find a good discount on the laptop you're looking for. Keep an eye on HP's website, Amazon, Best Buy, and other retailers for price drops and promotions.

Remember to compare prices across different retailers, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more assistance or advice on finding the best deal.
